actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage. If this damage would reduce a Small or larger target to 0 hit points  the target takes no damage from this attack.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: The bat can't use blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The bat has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing.
